name: Butter It
description:
A game where you have to move your smartphone like a frying pan and spread it with butter!
But, you must also take care that the embers of your campfire do not go out; For that, blow into your microphone and watch the campfire re-burn!

[GYROSCOPE RECOMMENDED BUT NOT MANDATORY]

-FEATURES-

  1. You can melt butter
  2. This game says nice things to you every time you close it, not like Mario, who says "Hey! come back here, you big monkey!"
  3. Tilt and blow in public to make people think you're crazy af
  4. Check the highest scores in the Top 10  Worldwide Online Leaderboard or, how I like to call it since 2 seconds ago, "WOL".
  5. You can melt butter :)
  6. You can report bugs saying "This game is glitching, you f****ng donkey" just as Gordon Ramsay would say
  7. Available in english and spanish
  8. Please just download it I worked so hard, I'm literally bleeding right here from the amount of effort I put on this game, please download it please please please
  9. You can melt butter ;)

*it may have some incompatibility issues with 19:9 aspect ratio and Xiaomi devices

Enjoy! :D
